>@Compendium[sfrpg.classes.fqYiP2f9oSfcmrwC]{Envoy}

At 3rd level and every 4 levels thereafter, you choose an expertise talent, which gives you an extra option when using a skill with which you have expertise. The list of expertise talents appears on pages 269â€“270.
